Plot: After the last encounter LT Ellen Ripley crash lands on Fiorina Fury 161, a deep space maximum security prison . When a serial killer haunts the facility, Ripley realizes that she brought along an unwelcome visitor.
Title: Alien³
Writer: Dan O'Bannon (characters), Ronald Shusett (characters), Vincent Ward (story), David Giler (screenplay), Walter Hill (screenplay), Larry Ferguson (screenplay)
Actors: Sigourney Weaver, Charles S. Dutton, Charles Dance, Paul McGann
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 19 nominations.
